name: They Live (M-16 Studio)
description: This is an UNOFFICIAL fan game that I made based on the movie "They Live"  for the Conspiracy Jam. Use the left and right arrow keys to move side to side, and up to jump. The game tends to freeze when it is on HTML, so for smoother game play you can download the Fusion 2.5 .mfa file at https://m-16-studio.itch.io/they-live-mfa. Enjoy!
